title: Please consider adding following features
comment: Night mode, Pull to refresh, scroll to top and bottom, better font size control.
Lovely fast minimalistic browser. But guys, PLEASE add an option to rearrange bookmarks in sidebar. They are mess now. Not even mentioning folders.

title: User Friendly and Lightweight
comment: This is a lightweight and fast browser. It has a dark theme setting after the last update. Option to change text size available.

title: Okay
comment: I like the lightweight browser and design, but I find that it will close tabs when switching between applications where other browsers wouldn't.  Using s6 edge

title: Url bar in full screen
comment: The fullscreen mode blocks part of the screen. And closing your final tab should leave a blank page, not close the app. But overall best browser on the market.
Much faster than chrome on my 2015 moto e

title: Used to be great!
comment: Constantly crashes. Please fix.

title: Quick Tab Needed and Slow Too Slow
comment: its not lightning fast at all I paid money for this and yet I still use my free browser because it works

title: not perfect, but the best there is...
comment: ...on android ... beware there are rip-offs that just add ads... this uses chrome too, so it's not that different either
simple and awesome, thx :-)

title: Good
comment: But could use a bit more polish and beauty

title: Snappy.
comment: Fast browser for sure.

title: Awesome
comment: Love it, however, sometimes the scroll physics switch off, meaning my scrolling action loses momentum. Please fix. Otherwise this is perfect. Thanks for offering features without sacrificing privacy.

title: Only Browser You Need!
comment: Fantastic collection of features that is updated regularly. Has one of the better implementations of reverse rendering, but it would be nice if this feature could be toggled without having too access a preference sub-menu...Maybe in a future update perhaps? (Hint, hint :D ).            More than worth the minor cost and the only Android browser you need.  I have not been experiencing random crashes as other reviewers have complained about.  Fast and stable on my M8 with CM12 based PacRom LP-5.1!

title: Sweet
comment: Never paid for a browser, tried free version it's super fast, however ad block does not block everything. Some sites got smarter with ads. Maybe you guys could add ghostery as well?

title: My favorite browser but...
comment: The address bar doesn't delete the whole link when you click the address bar and delete. Deletes the first couple of letters randomly.

title: Fast and light
comment: Great update. 1. Add option for desktop mode directly in page, not in settings. 2. Add Better tab handling 3. Add Better find in page.

title: Works Great
comment: 1 Suggestion: Allow shortcuts to be added to the address bar.  Things like reader mode, home, back and forward.

title: Great, daily driver...
comment: Please add bookmark folder management. Much needed feature. Thanks

title: Good...with design flaw.
comment: As I've said before this is an excellent browser, but to echo yesterday's review by Kevin Naimi, the address bar behavior is irritating to the point where it's stopping me using this browser. I do hope the developer gets this right soon. Unfortunately the developer does not seem to be that responsive currently so here's hoping he reads the feedback here.

title: Please add multi window feature!
comment: Please add multi window features for galaxy note's user!  It will be amazing update..please add multi window features I don't want to use chrome again

title: Good browser with irritating design flaw.
comment: Good browser. It's quite reliable and fast. The big problem is with the address/search bar in full screen mode. It doesn't move fluidly (like it used to) and always blocks any search bar that your typing in. It's really annoying.

title: Quick and beautiful
comment: Super fast and not a memory hog like other popular browsers. Worth every penny.

title: Almost perfect!
comment: I switched from the Chrome botnet and I must say--wow. Really nice. I have a couple recommendations. It would be nice if you could make an AMOLED black theme, and add a user agent switch to the quick menu to load desktop view on sites. Also, search suggestions don't work on the little homepage search bar. Other than that, it's excellent!

title: Definitely Faster Than Firefox, But....
comment: I'll need a few days of usage to make an informed judgment. It has a stripped down look, but there are more than enough customizations to satisfy me. Anything is better than Chrome in that respect. UPDATE: Emailed developer regarding lack of home screen shortcut option (no response). Still using Dolphin for shortcuts. No crashes on Galaxy Note 4. Adblock works perfectly!

title: Great browser
comment: Actually sprung for a paid version of something. Browser is great and fast with all the features you need.

title: Lg f60
comment: Beautiful update, small, and fast one of the best

title: Crashes with new update on ZTE Valet
comment: This is a very good browser that has worked on every device I have tried it on except for now with this new version it now crashes when searching or opening URL

title: Pretty darn fast
comment: I have to say,  I've just been using this for a day and it's the fastest browser I've seen. Very good.

title: GLITCH WITH SCROLLING S6 EDGE
comment: I am very impressed with this browser,  it's even better then chrome. However, there is a weird scrolling issue. When I scroll down a Web page, it's fluid,  but It scrolls fine then stops. It's weird.  Please look into it.

title: Fast and beautiful
comment: The speed and memory efficiency of this browser puts Chrome and Firefox to shame. It makes my Moto X and Nexus 7 far more usable. A million thanks to the dev for building it!

title: What Chrome should feel like
comment: Lightweight and fast, opens and closes instantaneously and switches between tabs with ease, even despite the poor memory management of Lollipop. Adblock is definitely worth the asking price for the paid version.

title: Almost perfect
comment: Popup ads come through even when ad blocking is turned on. Some links on Facebook won't render

title: GOD Almighty never break his promise to us wake up children of Jesus name.
comment: Revelation chapter 14, verse 4

title: Glorious update
comment: I was shocked by how this newest update improved lightning! The new full screen transition is much less disturbing, and this UI is as beautiful and intuitive as what chrome should have been. Money well well spent.

title: Just one little thing
comment: The new look and new(thankfully few) features are great. Just one thing, holding the back button used to close the app and all tabs and now it pulls up a menu to close. If I wanted to close just a single tab I would swipe right and close it. I hold the back button intentionally to close the app. Just seems a little redundant to have that dialog pop up.

title: Lives up to its name
comment: As fast as you can get and ad blocker actually works unlike chrome which seems to encourage ads. Deserves millions of downloads, keep it light and fast,                             EDIT another great update. Couldn't address bar just auto go up out of way after loading? and keep the short swipe to bring down?.

title: Gorgeous, speedy.
comment: While I do miss being able to sync my Chrome bookmarks, this browser is insanely fast and lightweight. I don't think I'll be going back to Chrome anytime soon!

title: Brilliant
comment: Simple, elegant and it works! Love the swipe from left/right feature and adblock.

title: Perfect
comment: Lightning by name, lightning by nature. Fast, lightweight browser with a minimalist design and an in-built ad blocker. So much sleeker and snappier than its bloated counterparts.

title: Loves it. Tab numbers missing
comment: I wish the tab numbers could be brought back. I think it's useful to know how many tabs are open. Pleeaaaase bring them back

title: Great
comment: Love it. Just needs better bookmark management!

title: Finally,  an update.
comment: Thank you dev.  Love the ui.  Love the smoothness.  By the way,  thanks for the improved ads block and black theme.  Gonna love it compare to the other browser.

title: Awesome, top notch, use this!
comment: Best browser by far, feature rich, slick, stable, built in ad blocker, highly configurable, I love it. Just one feature more would make it perfect... a proper Night Mode (black/deep grey background, white/off white type and images as normal) That would be the cherry on top. Really like the new update though, thanks.

title: Fantastic
comment: Feature rich, crazy fast but still very lightweight and battery friendly. Adblock function is the best ever on a mobile browser. No problems on Nexus 5. Highly recommend (do get the paid version for adblock)

title: Great and fast
comment: Like this browser and the latest update adds some nice features. Reader mode is a big plus.

title: Great! Just one problem with full screen
comment: It seems too difficult to bring down the search/address bar in full screen (in older versions the slightest scroll up would bring it down; now it requires one to scroll up the page significantly before it pops down).

title: Best browser ever.
comment: The best just got even better with this new material design update! Nice to see the developer continue support for this amazing browser. It's light, fast, and always gets the job done wonderfully. Keep up the great support!

title: New update gave it life
comment: What I would recommend though is to reduce the stickiness of the search bar in full-screen mode. See Chrome and how it's done there.

title: Needs improvement
comment: For some reason it makes gapps to crash sometimes, mostly when I'm in Facebook (I rather to use Facebook in web, its app sucks hard). Also, I can't save images of some sites where I'm usually able to save them with other browsers. Fix that, please.

title: Needs an update.
comment: This used to be my favourite browser however the ad blocking now doesn't seem to work, and with an Android update now I can no longer view flash. Come on, there are several browsers that manage to bypass Android and run flash (Firefox and Dolphin to name 2) so why can't Lightning? Please update as I'm now using another browser until this is fixed.

title: go to browser
comment: I have several different browsers installed, all for different purposes, but lightning browser is my main go to browser. clean ui (love the slide out tabs and bookmarks) and color mode makes it perfectly lollipop. I hope to see casting soon, it would be a good crowning feature. all in all this browser is worth more than $1.50 asking price.

title: Very satisfied
comment: At the moment It works like a charm!

title: Pretty Good
comment: Need to test more, but I like this browser!  Really disappointed that you can't use flash in KitKat and above, even if you sideload it.  Yes, flash is not supported and is not perfect, but there are still A LOT of sites that require it.  Dev should please reconsider, even if they add a pop-up warning when you turn it on in options.

title: Good for quick browsing
comment: I especially like that it works well with a USB OTG connected mouse.

title: Open Source Browser
comment: Dropped this Chrome for this browser. Blazingly fast, and the Dev is doing this as merely a side project. Props to him! Easily worth more than $1.50.

title: I like it for Phones
comment: but it needs a back button in tablet mode at the top left

title: Crash vs Responsiveness
comment: Pretty good browser that's easy to use, too bad it crashes every few minutes and when you have 8+ tabs open, it becomes so responsive you'll have to keep tapping links for a minute before it registers. Highly NOT recommended!

title: Excellent!
comment: See my review on the free version. Buy this app - it's definitely worth every penny! This browser,  with find in page,  easy bookmarks and back/forward pages, far surpasses Chrome,  IE, Firefox, Maxthon and all other browsers. Simply put,  there is no other option.. This IS the browser to get and to buy!

title: a bit on the slow side
comment: Chrome and Now Browser load page quite faster.

title: Perfect lightweight browser
comment: Very low ram usage, built in ad blocker, a truly dark theme, and incognito mode are some of the features of this brilliant browser by an XDA developer.

title: Incognito mode is meaningless
comment: For example, open incognito tab and goto some shopping site. Add item to cart. Close tab and close browser. Try above again and notice the item is still in cart.

title: Perfect mobile browser
comment: I've tried almost every browser on Android, including Chrome, Firefox, Opera, UC, CM, Now, Next, Dolphin, Puffin, Boat, and a few others I can't remember. I have always ended up back on Lightning+. It's fast, clean, and the UI is perfect for a touch device. The security options are great, and the built in Orbot (Tor) capability is great. The ad blocker is basic but does what it needs to without slowing things down. And finally it is very light on resources. Nothing is perfect, but this is pretty close.

title: Great browser!
comment: Adblocking without root!  For those asking for an exit button, it appears that the developer has saved on "screen clutter".  To exit, LONG-PRESS the "back" button on your device.  This backs you out to your start page, closes all tabs, and closes Lightning.

title: Almost Perfect
comment: 5 stars if full screen is modified to be less jarring when the omni bar appears/disappears and if search suggestions gain an arrow that adds the suggested text to the omni bar. I'd find a way to give it 6 stars if Chromecast support was added.

title: brilliant
comment: edit to  my original review , i found the desktop mode option (dummy) so now its perfect for me , love the ad blocking feature

title: Best browser
comment: Really happy with this purchase. Love the new look. Would like to be able to swipe away old tabs from the draw.
There is a small blue progress bar right under the URL bar at the top of the page.
Does what I need quickly - with low-cost. Can't ask for more!!

title: Great Alternative Browser
comment: This is one of the best browsers I've seen. Up there with the likes of Chrome, Firefox & Opera.

title: Spectacular browser.....
comment: Please make an exit button! Thanks in advance if that can happen.  😉
Fast

title: This is what I'm talking about!!!!!
comment: SUPER FAST!!!!! Create an exit button please.

title: It got everything that I need.
comment: Lightweight, fast,  user-friendly,  simple + Adblock!

title: Crashing
comment: Is the only issue I have so far.  I like it,  but it gets annoying.  Need consistency.  I was forced to go back to chrome. But I prefer this app.

title: It's amazing
comment: Although better when you have the paid version. I recommend. Its not even that much...

title: An excellent browser!
comment: This browser is simple, fast and extremely stable. It does need better cache clearing and it needs the ability to import/export bookmarks but those things aside this is a very nice little browser.

title: Excellent
comment: I used to use Chrome but the material update has made the app too large in size for me to enjoy anymore. This one has simple design and is very fast. The only thing I would like is a bookmarks manager and the ability to put bookmarks into folders.

title: Great! But with some flaws...
comment: Lightning Browser+ is an awesome browser; simplistic, yet powerful enough for moderate power-users. However, there are some bugs...if you have the left drawer (tab-drawer) open while entering an address the browser crashes when you press enter, it never fails. Also, when you press the "x" to close a tab at the bottom of the list, it sometimes closes a random tab near the top of the list. (Running on Android 4.4.4, Nexus 5)

title: Yep.
comment: This is sooo good. Have tried many others but you guys have nailed. Simple and efficient. Thanks a mil

title: Crashes like hell.
comment: Am using the paid app. This browser can't hold on for more than ten minutes before crashing. Developer needs to do something if (s)he cares.

title: Money Back
comment: Maan Gimme My Money Back You Can't Even Set a Home It Goes To The App Home Page Which Isn't Available smh

title: FASTEST BROWSER EVER !
comment: Had been trying many android browsers and lightning browser is the fastest browser ever used !
A browser that runs well on older, slower devices and has built in Adblock? Yes, please! Well worth the paltry sum being charged for it.

title: >>>>> f a s t !!!!!
comment: this will become your default browser

title: Work in Progress?
comment: Needs home button as already noted. Could do with a little "progress bar" or "working" gif to confirm search status. Needs a working clear cookies on exit option. "Lightning" is a bit of an exaggeration- it's only as fast as the slowest link in the chain and the old and much loved Opera browser is faster (IMO) Messes with "Hacker's Keyboard". (carriage return absent) Could be better then, but I'm confident it will be in time.

title: Love it
comment: Wish it had read later feature

title: Fastest I've used...
comment: Faster than the text only browser I tried.

title: Fast
comment: I am happy so far works good and loads fast I would also like to see a home button like others are suggesting

title: Not what it claims to be.
comment: Hate the time it takes to load the pages Firefox loads in a blink of an eyes. Need a refund Mr. Developer. You shouldn't be selling it with false claims.
Only downside is that there doesn't appear to be a way to back up bookmarks. in other words Iost all my bookmarks after resettig the tablet.

title: Great Lightweight Browser
comment: This is an excellent browser alternative for people that don't need all the extra bloat of Chrome, Firefox, etc. and want a straightforward mobile browser. The fact that it's open source is another huge plus. The only thing stopping it from being my default browser is a lack of night and/or inverted mode.

title: Perfect for fast answers
comment: The irony of the Android ecosystem is that to date Chrome STILL answers search queries with a blank page on a regular basis. After months of trying/abandoning other browsers this one showed up and it's brilliant. Barebones doesn't begin to describe it but it works. It is fast as Chrome ever is and easy on the eye to boot. Few options means less tampering and of course, no ads touting their other products. It works fast and well and so far zero crashes. I'll happily pay for a night setting too

title: Awesome!
comment: Within a minute of trying the free version I purchased the full version. It does everything I need it to do and does it more quickly or better than most of the alternatives. I have tried many mobile browsers and this is the best of its kind for me.The only thing that I was a bit shocked to see was that text reflow for this app is not supported on Android Kitkat 4.4. Opera browser supports this feature on Kitkat. Just wondering if there are any plans to develop a text reflow feature for devices running Kitkat? Thank you.
It's a bit basic but it's fast and does the job for most mobile web browsing needs.

title: Great
comment: This browser can do everything you need: browse the web. The UI is just native Android: I like it simple. Also this is the only browser that's 100% responsive on my old Galaxy S (Android 4.4.4).

title: Nearly Perfecto
comment: This Browser is great but one thing I require to call it euphemistically perfect is bookmark syncing with Chrome. I have a memory loss disability and I use a computer, a tablet and my phone. With everything in sync, life is fast, functional and things get done as they should. The diametric opposite that happens when things are not in sync is depressing and that's only the first word of many for a description. Oh Lightning... So close.
The BEST Browser in the Market!
Very smooth

title: Amazing
comment: Loved the free version SO much, bought the pro.  This browser is fast, smooth and stable.  Have tried them all.  This has become my go to browser!

title: Simply Powerful
comment: A quick and easy-to-use browser. With its' simple design packed with the necessary features; this can give you the most pleasant browsing experience. Leaving out one star just to give room for more improvement.

title: Great
comment: My new go to web browser.

title: The type of uncluttered interface all apps should aim for.
comment: Aside from the clean look, I purchased this app because I really admire the way it handles tabs (sliding in from the left) and bookmarks (sliding in from the right).  The more I use it, the more I'm coming to appreciate the simplicity and consistency of its design. Plus, it's one of the few browsers that looks good on my tablet. UPDATE:  The addition of ad blocking removed the last hurdle to making this my default browser.

title: Nice.
comment: Works well

title: Excellent minimalistic browser
comment: Its a little jumpy on Note3. Hope developer will look into it.

title: Great
comment: Paid to support the Dev. Thank you for this great browser.

title: Awesome
comment: Light and fast browser

title: Great
comment: Great Browser and very fast. Is there anyway to add website to home page and not just bookmark?

title: Its fast for some stuff.
comment: mediocre

title: Amazing!
comment: I love it! Just needs a night mode and it would be perfect

title: Great but missing an option to organise bookmarks
Love the browser
comment: I don't like the new slide outs -they constantly get in my way

title: Can not open new background tab
comment: Fixed

title: Fast!
comment: Very fast and small, runs great on Nexus 10

title: Cuto's to the Developer!!
comment: I would have never thought this level of dedication and awesome browser-ness would have been possible until I found this app. Thank you!

title: excellent
comment: Will test on my pipo m9pro. Assuming it works, it is the best browser ever, with an active developer who will fix problems in less than a day. Need to find PayPal donate link because I have this on 4+ devices.

Hi James,

The latest update fixes those crashes. Really sorry for the inconvenience.

title: Lightning fast!
comment: Fixed Nexus 7 and Nexus 10 tablet bug with this update. The names says it all. Fastest browser for Android. It'll be cool if you can add a "Reader Mode" feature to make reading articles easier.

title: Fix crashes
comment: Love the browser I didn't destar you because I know you will fix

title: Full fledget but light browser on old phones
comment: I fully  replaced dolphin-mini with lighting on my galaxy ace. Works very well

title: Great browser
comment: After coming from boat browser, it was like getting out of a 1984 Bentley and into a Lotus Elise. Its quick at rendering and has good text reflow. The left & right swipe gestures are a bonus too..

title: Love it, and here's some suggestions.
comment: 1. IP type URL like 192.168.1.1 could  NOT access correctly unless add http:// manually before the IP address. 2. The animation of tabs is too slow, and please don't separate tabs so away...  That way looks not so good. Please consider update soon.

title: A Very Good Browser
comment: As the Dev. says: Try the Free Version first. If you like it, then consider installing the Plus version for the additional features. DEVS: Thanks for having a (User Agent) Desktop option. Toshiba Excite 7.7 tablet, Android JB 4.1.1.  Samsung Galaxy Mega 6.3 phone, Android JB 4.2.2.

title: not bad
comment: its cool

title: Pmg
comment: Cool

title: Good
comment: Need some option,  such as save page,  block ads.....

title: Nice Simple Bloat Free Browser,  But...
comment: Nice Simple Bloat Free Browser,  But... after all this time you still have not updated this application so it can use the external SD as the download directory?

title: Good
comment: Fast

title: Shockingly fast!
comment: This is now my goto browser...its fast, has everything I want, and the permissions are right

title: Good but....
comment: Paid version needs to look better and have more features than the free version, like a better looking icon that's a totally different design, it also needs more features like other browsers and that the free version doesn't have, like sliding and just an updated look, also be a bit faster and smaller in size, also have different themes and designs to make it look better and more customizable with a updated and better interface.
Good Suggestions. Thanks.

title: Very good browser
comment: It is very smooth (like Safari on Apple devices) and can beat out any other browser. It is clean and bug free. Honestly, I had no problem paying for the paid version and I'm that guy that normally just uses the free stuff.

title: Fastest browser yet.
comment: Works great for most sites. However it needs an option to dispay websites in desktop mode. I hate mobile websites. Will give it 5 stars when thats added.

title: Amazing
comment: Wow dev this is a nice browser, faster than chrome, nice minimal UI, love the new icon. Great work!

title: Love it, but flaws
comment: Shows a true desktop experience w/flash if that's your preference. If you close the browser and come back to it through multi tasking, only one tab will come back up... even if you had multiple ones showing when you closed. I really like this browser; hope everything gets fixed. Super fast and low profile.  8/7/2013 - Forced close when trying to access advanced settings.

title: Please fix!
comment: When watching a YouTube video it doesn't go into full screen mode and there are white borders around the edges and makes the video look tiny. If this was fixed it would be my main browser for sure. I'll rate five stars if fixed. **EDIT** the problem has been fixed! Thank you Dev.
I believe this is fixed in the latest version, please test and update your review accordingly.

title: Excellent browser
comment: Fast and lightweight.   Would like to see the ability to change the search.   So far great work. Don't boat it by adding useless features.  Awesome browser!  Now my primary

title: SGS4
comment: Works great.

title: Great
comment: Works on ouya

title: Not many updates anymore
comment: When I open the browser I still experience alot of problems and I had bought this over 3-4 months ago. So what happened? Why is the last update may 4th?

I waited a while to update the app because I wanted to add a lot of features. Also, developing is not my primary job and I cannot spend all day everyday doing it. I hope the update I just put out was worth the wait. If you follow me on Google+ you would see that I was hard at work on the browser.

title: Super Cool
comment: I decided to purchase the full version just so you were more likely to read my review haha, app is super fast and looks fantastic. got some suggestions for you, when watching a video on youtube for example (even though most people use the app) when you rotate your screen to landscape the navigation bar blocks a large portion of the video, so somehow detect a video playing and make it full screen? also with the nav bar having the tabs aswell makes it very bulky and takes up a lot of viewing area. And also my last suggestion, when retyping a URL that youve previously searched, with the suggestions popping up make them just 1 long text box instead of a huge cube. these isues arent really that big, just thought id give my 2 cents to help improve the app so you can 1 day be at the top of the play store!

title: Force close
comment: Had free version always force close so bought paid always force close since recent update REPAIR...........................................It was great but let's fix it.............As of April 15th still crashes.Can we really fix this time please.................................................................... Period
I have updated the app many times since this review, please update your review to reflect any problems you still have.

title: Good
comment: Needs option to reorganize bookmarks and the recent update wiped out half my bookmarks which was very annoying.

title: Great potential
comment: Very fast when loading pages and very decent scrolling performance (I'm very demanding when it comes to scrolling). Page rendering seems to be flawless as far as I've seen. Unfortunately, there are still (minor but still too many) flaws that are holding it back: -Bookmarks are too simplistic, presentation is lacking and there is no way to rearrange them -Annoying bug when setting about:home as starting page to have the bookmark page open, as soon as a tab is closed, it won't work anymore and will default to about:blank -Pressing the X to close a tab seems a bit difficult, maybe the hotspot is too small...? -No home button!? -When opening a new tab and it displays about:home, it is necessary to wipe it by hand before typing an address or a search -Fullscreen mode is far from perfect and too rudimentary, having it appear over the page as soon as placed at the top is annoying, it should ideally appear when scrolling and stay for a second and then go away (like most other fullscreen browsers) Apart from that, it's still my main browser on my Nexus 4 with CM10.1, but for a paid product, it needs to be perfect. Correct those flaws and it's a solid 5 stars for me.

title: Error
comment: If set fullscreen mode,  Can't set bookmark as home. Already set to about:home,  but always show blank screen
This is fixed in the latest version, please test and update your review accordingly.

title: The BEST Web Browser!
comment: Loads REALLY fast! No choppy screens, it just loads the entire webpage all at once. I just wished this also had the option to view full desktop websites like Chrome.

title: Over all lovely
comment: Mossing just home button. Please could you add it? ;-)  Love product and happy.

title: Good...
comment: Please allow option to sync bookmarks... Please!

title: Good but useless without sync bookmarks with chrome
comment: As above
There is the ability to import bookmarks from chrome in the latest version, although it does not sync the other way, it is an improvement.

title: Fair.
comment: I love the ui quite a lot.  But the bookmarks! Omg they look so so bad..........  They need to sync with Google or at least import from it.  3 stars for a good ui. Needs basic features no matter how light the browser is.

title: Excellent Browser!
comment: I've tried nearly all the browsers available for Android and never been completely happy with any of them. Then I stumbled acorss Lightning in Tablified Market,  and man,  so pleased I did. Yes,  at this stage its a bit more basic than others,  but its truly fast, nice Ui, very small size (200kb) and supports Flash superbly! And the developer responds to emails and fixes problems super quick. Still needs some improvements, like being able to edit the names of bookmarks,  but overall it really is the best browser available for Android. Give it a try,  doubt you will be disappointed.

title: Nice
comment: Well worth the money. Thank you.

title: Solved my flash problem!!!
comment: I use this on ASUS TF700t.  I needed to have access to a specific site that requires flash.  I was fine until I made the mistake of upgrading to JB.  I went through all kinds of hoops trying to get flash to work.  I managed to get it working for lots of sites but never for the one place I really needed it to work.  I was pretty much thinking I was going to have risk unlocking & rooting my device to get back to ICS.  I thought I would try 1 more browser claiming to support flash.  It works flawlessly.  No problems so far.  I haven't noticed any big improvement in speed, but it is definitely  not any slower than any others.  Great App, keep up the good work.

title: Nicely done
comment: Lightning fast, very good browsing experience

title: Thumbs up
comment: Its probably not a five yet, but its getting there and the effort is worth a five. I don't have an android browser I'm completely happy with. I think this is on the right track. Woody
